v.v: You Israelite people, answer this question:
we would have all been killed
They would have been like a flood of water sweeping us away;
and we would all have drowned in the flood.
We have escaped from our enemies as a bird escapes from the trap that hunters have set;
Yahweh is the one who helps us;

v: What would have happened to us if Yahweh had not been helping us?
if Yahweh had not been fighting for us,
because they were very angry with us!
it would have been as though the water had covered us,
because he has not allowed our enemies to destroy us.
it is as though the trap that our enemies set for us was broken
and we have escaped from it!
he is the one who made heaven and the earth.
